items.name: Punjabi Chole Masala
items.description: A flavorful and spicy chickpea curry, traditionally made with a blend of aromatic spices, tomatoes, and onions.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chole Tikki Chat
items.description: A popular Indian street food that combines spicy and tangy chickpeas (chole) with crisp potato patties (tikki), topped with yogurt, chutneys, and various garnishes. (2 tikki)

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Veg Korma
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in yogurt based gravy with cramalised onion, cashew and freshly ground spices topped with fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Lamb Korma
items.description: A luxurious and aromatic dish made with tender lamb pieces simmered in a creamy, spiced yogurt and nut-based sauce. It's flavored with a blend of spices, including cardamom, cloves, and cinnamon.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Kebab
items.description: A popular dish featuring marinated pieces of chicken,  grilled to perfection. The marinade  consists of yogurt, lemon juice, and a blend of spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and paprika. (4)

items.name: Molagutal
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish, particularly from the Tamil Brahmin cuisine, made with a combination of vegetables and lentils. It features a thick, mildly spiced coconut-based gravy seasoned with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and dry red chilies. Served with steamed rice

items.name: Veg Kofta Curry
items.description: A rich and creamy dish where vegetable dumplings (koftas) made from mixed vegetables and paneer are cooked in a spiced tomato and cashew-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dehati Chicken
items.description: Also known as Country Chicken Curry, is a rustic and flavorful dish from rural India. It features chicken cooked in a rich gravy made with traditional spices, tomatoes, onions, and often includes ingredients like garlic, ginger, and fresh green chilies. The dish is known for its earthy, robust flavors
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Puttu And Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Veg Berry Pulao
items.description: A flavorful rice dish made with a mix of vegetables, aromatic spices, and dried berries. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Chicken Berry Pulao
items.description: A popular Parsi dish that is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. The dish is made with fragrant basmati rice, tender chicken, and a variety of aromatic spices. The pulao is then topped with a mix of sweet and tangy berries, caramelized onions, and nuts, giving it a beautiful and unique taste. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Veg Railway Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic and flavorful snack that was famously served in Indian Railways dining cars. It is a type of vegetable cutlet made from mashed potatoes and mixed vegetables, spiced with garam masala and other seasonings, then breaded and shallow-fried until crispy. (4)

items.name: Dal tadka and rice
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made from yellow lentils that are cooked until soft and then tempered with a flavorful mix of ghee or oil, cumin seeds, garlic, onions, tomatoes, and a variety of spices such as turmeric, red chili powder, and garam masala. The tempering, or "tadka," infuses the dal with a rich aroma and enhances its taste.

items.name: Veg Singapore Fried Rice
items.description: A flavorful and spicy stir-fried rice dish including various vegetables, aromatic spices and seasonings. It's known for its bold and spicy flavors.

items.name: Chicken Singapore Fried Rice
items.description: A flavorful and spicy stir-fried rice dish that includes various vegetables and chicken topped with aromatic spices and seasonings. It's known for its bold and spicy flavors.

items.name: Honey Chilli Potatoes
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese appetizer or snack. Deep-fried potato wedges or fries are tossed in a sweet and spicy sauce made with honey, soy sauce, chili sauce, and other seasonings.

items.name: Masala Rice
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic dish made by cooking rice with a variety of spices and vegetables. The spices used include cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon, and cardamom, along with onions, tomatoes, ginger, and garlic.

items.name: Bhindi Masala
items.description: A popular north Indian dish made with okra cooked in a tomato based sauce with a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Khatta Meetha Chicken
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish that combines sweet and tangy elements in a rich, spiced chicken curry. It's known for its balanced taste, achieved by using ingredients like raw mango slices for tangy flavour and ripe mango puree for sweetness and a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pinewheel Samosa
items.description: A savory Indian snack that features a spiced potato filling rolled into a flaky pastry dough, sliced and baked to create a pinwheel shape. (6 pieces)

items.name: Aloo Paratha
items.description: Wholewheat Indian flatbread stuffed with a mixture of mashed potato, chillies and spices. Served with achar and a side of onion-tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Bengali Aloo Dum
items.description: A Bengali dish made by simmering potatoes in a gravy of tomatoes, ginger, garlic and a variety of spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kosha Mangsho
items.description: Bengali lamb curry marinated in ginger garlic paste, chillies, yogurt and spices and cooked to perfection. Topped with garam masala and ghee
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ghugni
items.description: A popular street food and snack in India. Made from dried peas that are cooked with spices, including cumin, coriander, turmeric, and served with tamarind chutney, chopped onions, and green chilies.

items.name: Chicken Tehri
items.description: A comforting one pot meal. Chicken & rice cooked with onion, ginger, garlic and spices.

items.name: Veg Kadhai
items.description: A vibrant, spicy Indian dish made with a medley of mixed vegetables, cooked in a richly flavored tomato-based gravy, and seasoned with aromatic spices. It's typically served with roti, naan, or rice, making it a hearty and satisfying vegetarian meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Murg do Pyaza
items.description: A flavorful Indian chicken curry that features succulent pieces of chicken cooked with a generous amount of onions added at two stages, creating a rich and aromatic gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki Chaat
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Kashmiri Paneer Kalai
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a rich, creamy gravy flavored with Kashmiri spices such as saffron, cardamom, and cloves. This dish is known for its luxurious texture and delicate flavors
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds.

items.name: Veg Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies and spices and lots of flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies, chicken, spices & lots flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy deep fried noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, veg manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Palak Kichidi
items.description: Rice cooked with spinach, lentils, ginger, garlic and spices making it a delicious and comforting meal
